resources.string: Why doesn’t the mod install or shows an import error?

• Make sure the mod version matches your Minecraft version.
 • Supported versions are listed at the bottom of the mod page.
 • Make sure you have enough free storage.
 • Try restarting Minecraft and the app.
Why is the mod not showing in the game?
• Open world settings and enable the mod manually.\n • Make sure Experimental Features are enabled.\n • Try creating a new world with this mod.
The app says there is no internet, but I have connection
If you have internet but the app still shows an error, we are probably already aware of the issue. There may be technical work on the server. Please try again later.
Why does it say the file is corrupted?
• The download may have been interrupted.\n • Delete the mod and download it again.\n • Check your internet connection.
How to install a mod?

• Open the mod page.
 • Click on the file.
 • Tap Download.
 • Wait until download finishes.
 • Tap Install.
 • Open the mod in Minecraft.
How to install a texture pack or skin?
The process is the same as for mods. After installation, enable it in Minecraft settings.
Do I need internet to use the app?
Internet is required to download mods. Installed mods work offline.
Will there be new mods?
Yes. We regularly add new mods and updates.
Where to report if something doesn’t work?
On the mod screen, tap the “Not working” button. Describe the problem in detail and we will try to help as soon as possible.
I have my own mod. How can I share it?
You can suggest your mod directly in the app. Tap the button below to open the submission screen.
Submit a mod
Can I play with mods in multiplayer?
It depends on the server. Usually the server must support the same mod.
Are mods safe?
Yes. All mods are checked. We do not publish viruses or malicious files.
Why does the mod lag?
• Some mods are heavy for the device.\n • Close other apps.\n • Try lowering graphics settings in Minecraft.
Why does the app contain ads?
Ads help us support and develop the app and keep mods updated. We tried to make ads as unobtrusive as possible.
